string-array.name: commands_descs
string-array.item: Categories: Business, Entertainment, General, Health, Science, Sports, Technology
Terms: Bitcoin, PlayStation 5, SmartPhones, Joe Biden…
Sources: CNN, Wired, BBC News, Time, IGN, Buzzfeed, ABC News…

string-array.name: commands_speaks
string-array.item: Try saying: Give me the latest news
Try saying: Give me the latest Technology news
Try saying: What\'s up with Bitcoin
Try saying: Give me the news from CNN
